pages.text: When dealing with Raids, some of the Raiders have a bad tendency of falling into holes, appearing in places deep underground and so on. After many research, you've managed to improve on the Villager's Bell to not only have a much higher radius of effect, but also teleports any Raider towards the Bell's vicinity if they're more than 16 Blocks away from it!
Unfortunately, the newly Hook Bell does not respond to any Redstone power and can only be rung, by hand or from projectiles shot, from beings like yourself.
